title: Add regression tests and monitoring to prevent fit-tier from overpowering deal-dynamics signals

sections.text: Create automated regression tests that validate forecasting scores and best-next-action rankings are penalized/capped when procurement, competition, or internal alignment risk signals are present, even for high-fit accounts. Add lightweight monitoring (dashboards/alerts) that tracks score-component distributions and flags workspaces where fit-tier contribution exceeds configured thresholds under negative deal dynamics. Use scenarios and thresholds derived from the GOLD-97 audit report to prevent future scoring regressions.
